scripts.build: tslint -c tslint.json 'src/**/*.ts' && tsc -p . && cp -r workflows build/
scripts.workflow: npm run clean && npm run build && node build/src/index.js
scripts.test: npm run build_tests && npm run execute_tests
scripts.execute_tests: tslint -c tslint.json 'tests/**/*.ts' && mocha --require source-map-support/register --opts tests/mocha.opts build/tests/**/*-test.js
scripts.build_tests: tslint -c tslint.json 'src/**/*.ts' && npm run clean && tsc -p .
